ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Xenobiologis: Orkoids
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.5.1 Adds Warhammer 40k Orkz/Grotz as playable races
Contents Races: Orks - Humanlike Grots - Humanlike Snotlings - Advanced Animal Squigs - Animal: Cave Squig: similar to wargs, but can grow quite large given enough time. Eatin Squigs: slow and stupid, only good fer eatin! Oily Squigs: slow and stupid, but produce chemfuel over time.
Factions: Space Orkz: Spacer Tech level Greenskin faction. Feral Orkz Tribal Tech level Greenskin faction. Hulk Orkz: Permantly Hostile Hidden faction. Rok Orkz: Permantly Hostile Hidden faction.
Ork Player Faction Ork Player Tribe
Scenarios: Space Ork Start Feral Ork Start
Apparel: Greenskin Shirt (Ork/Grot only) Greenskin Jacket (Ork/Grot only) Slava Cowl (Ork/Grot only) Studded Arma (Ork/Grot only) Studded Elmet (Ork/Grot only) Flak Arma (Ork only) 'Ard Hat (Ork/Grot only) 'Eavy Arma (Ork only) 'Eavy 'Ard Hat (Ork/Grot only) Mega Arma (Ork only) Mega Elmet (Ork only)
Wargear: Stikkbomb Packs (Frag, Krak, Tankbusta) Kustom Force Field (Shield) Bosspole (Ork only) Iron Gob (Ork only)
Plants: Orkoid Fungus - the symbiotic fungus that is essential the orkoid ecosystem, it is a source of food, Squigs, Snotlings, Grots and Orks. Orkoid Cocoons - Cocoons are spawned by an event, intended to represet 'wild' spore growth and Cannot be planted.
Buildings: Ork Crafting Supplies (Machining Table) Ork Fermenting Barrel - requires Syrchalis' Universal Fermenter mod Ork Butcher Table Ork Fueled Stove Ork Drug lab Ork Stele Waaaagh! Banner
Resources: Orkoid Fungus - a food Speckled Bloodshade - Medical Fungus Ork Bitz - basic orkish crafting material Ork Komponent - Orkish components
Ork Waart - made from orkoid fungus, used to make Grog - requires [SYR] Universal Fermenter Ork Grog - a foul orkish alcholic beverage made from fungal Waart - requires [SYR] Universal Fermenter
Mechanics: Orkoid - All Orkz count as having both the Bloodlust and Psychopath trait. Symbiotic Fungus - All Orkoids originate from the same strain of fungal spores, which can mature into a might warboss, or a tiny mushroom. Fightyness -
Load Order info: Humanoid Alien Races( if used, ideally this should be loaded as close to the top of your list as possible ) SRTS( if used ) Combat Extended( if used ) Astra Militarum Core( if used ) Astra offical addons( if used ) Corruption Core( if used ) Corruption offical addons( if used ) Armoury Magos Xenobiologis( if used ) Playable Orkz( This Mod ),Eldar,Tau,Etc( if used ) order doesnt matter
